price: Wọ́n sì ń wí pé: “Ṣé a máa fi àwọn òrìṣà wa sílẹ̀ nítorí eléwì wèrè kan?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
